price: He said, “My Lord, because of the blessings that You have bestowed upon me, I will never be a supporter of the wicked.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā anʿamta ʿalayya falan akūna ẓahīran lil'muj'rimīna
